title: Honey-Can-Do SHO-01172 4-Tier Closet Storage Shelf Instruction Video
description: Instruction video for assembling your new Honey-Can-Do SHO-01172 4-tier closet storage shelf

asset.author: myhoneycando
asset.description: Instruction video for assembling your new Honey-Can-Do SHO-01172 4-tier closet storage shelf

transcripts: At Honey-Can-Do we are your source for organization, storage and style. We make product assembly easy so that well any honey can do it. To begin remove product contents and group all like parts. Locate the four bottom uprights and notice the spring buttons go on top. Now place base caps on the bottom of each bottom upright like this, then attach the bottom shelf to the bottom uprights like this. The second shelf attaches the same way notice that the front of the shelves curve down a bit and the backs of the shelves are elevated. Now stack the two top uprights on top of the bottom uprights by pushing in on the spring buttons and positioning them until they click into place. Then attach the top two shelves using the same method as the first two and voila perfect for sweaters, shoes, bags or anything you'd like to keep organized invisible your four tier storage shelf is ready for organizing just about any area around the house you wish, happy organizing. At honey-can-do we don't believe you have to go broke to have a beautiful well-organized home and assembly should be easy to do.
